name: list_of_room_facility_types
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool booking_com.
Tool description: Find all hotels, view prices, photos of the hotels, reviews. Find car rental deals. **Site:** booking.com **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters
API description: Fetches a list of room facility types from the Booking.com API based on given criteria.

room_facility_type_id.description: ID of the specific room facility type to filter.

facility_type_id.description: ID of the specific room facility type to filter.
